definition: to pay the bill/to settle accounts/also written 結賬|结账
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)

sentences.english: Collect bills from travel services and hand the payment to the teller.
sentences.chinese: 負責與旅行社的結帳工作，收款後交於出納。

sentences.english: Could you give us another month to settle an account?
sentences.chinese: 你能再寬限我一個月結帳嗎？

sentences.english: We ask all our guests to do so to ensure a smooth and rapid check out at busy time…
sentences.chinese: 我們要求客人先付帳以確保在忙碌時段順利結帳。

sentences.english: These cards allow you to tap readers at gas stations pumps or check-out counters.
sentences.chinese: 人們可以用這種信用卡在加油站或者櫃檯刷卡結帳。

sentences.english: May I have your chook—out time please?
sentences.chinese: 請問您什麼時間要結帳退宿？

sentences.english: At checkout time a hotel guest will ask the front desk to prepare the final bill for payment.
sentences.chinese: 結帳時，客人會要前臺準備付款結算單。

sentences.english: Conducting a pre-launch checkout of the rocket.
sentences.chinese: 進行發射前結帳的火箭。

sentences.english: Hrs. Have breakfast and check out and drive to Lake Nakuru National park.
sentences.chinese: 早飯後結帳並駕車前往納庫魯湖。

sentences.english: They that reckon without their host are to reckon twice.
sentences.chinese: 店主不在便結帳，還得結第二次帳。

sentences.english: Under checkout my websites and unburden me what do you think.
sentences.chinese: 在結帳的表白我的網站我你有什麼感想。

sentences.english: You can pay right here. In cash or by credit card?
sentences.chinese: 你可以在這裏結帳，用現金還是信用卡？

sentences.english: You will install and config Virtuemart, adding Paypal and Google Checkout.
sentences.chinese: 您將安裝和配置零售商資訊，添加貝寶和谷歌結帳。

sentences.english: We would also like to point out that we mainly settle our accounts on a document.-against-acceptance basis.
sentences.chinese: 我們還想指出我們主要以承兌交單方式結帳。

sentences.english: Our debit note no. 40 is still unsettled. please send remittance to cover it.
sentences.chinese: 我方第40號借方通知仍未得到償付，請匯款來結帳。

sentences.english: I'm leaving for Chendu tomorrow. Will you close my account?
sentences.chinese: 我打算明天到成都去。請給我結帳好嗎？

sentences.english: Closing time is up, they need to checkout before you pay.
sentences.chinese: 打烊時間已到，需要先結帳，先幫您買單。

definition: to pay the bill/to settle accounts/also written 結帳|结帐
(at a restaurant) to order a meal/(of a waiter) to take an order
to place an order/to order/an order (of goods)
sales counter/front desk/bar/(of markets, medicines etc) OTC (over-the-counter)
to pay the bill (in a restaurant etc) (loanword from Cantonese)/(fig.) to bear responsibility
variant of 櫃檯|柜台[gui4 tai2]
